dx._description: Scripts to exclude from dictionary break

normal._description: CSS level 3 line-break=normal, e.g. treat CJ as ID, break before hyphens for ja,zh

strict._description: CSS level 3 line-break=strict, e.g. treat CJ as NS

lw._description: Line break key for CSS lev 3 word-break options

breakall._description: CSS lev 3 word-break=break-all, allow midword breaks unless forbidden by lb setting

keepall._description: CSS lev 3 word-break=keep-all, prohibit midword breaks except for dictionary breaks

normal._description: CSS lev 3 word-break=normal, normal script/language behavior for midword breaks

phrase._description: Prioritize keeping natural phrases (of multiple words) together when breaking, used in short text like title and headline

ss._description: Sentence break parameter key to control use of suppressions data

standard._description: Use segmentation suppressions data of type standard
